# Confirmation footer



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Overview

The Confirmation Content component wraps around the content of confirmations to serve as a stable root for conditional rendering.

## Properties

| Property            | Attribute             | Description                                                                           | Type                | Default        |
| ------------------- | --------------------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ------------------- | -------------- |
| `clickInsideCloses` | `click-inside-closes` | Determines if the parent component closes when a click happens inside this component. | `boolean`           | `false`        |
| `theme`             | `theme`               | Defines the theme of the component.                                                   | `"Dark" \| "Light"` | `ThemeDefault` |


## Slots

| Slot | Description                                 |
| ---- | ------------------------------------------- |
|      | Passes content to the Confirmation Content. |


----------------------------------------------
